name: Introduction to Web Development
description: Learn the fundamentals of web development, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Data Science Foundations
description: Explore the world of data science, machine learning, and data analysis techniques.

name: Mobile App Development with React Native
description: Build cross-platform mobile apps using React Native and enhance your mobile development skills.

name: UI/UX Design Principles
description: Master the principles of user interface and user experience design to create captivating digital experiences.

name: Artificial Intelligence Basics
description: Delve into the basics of artificial intelligence, neural networks, and AI applications.

name: Cybersecurity Fundamentals
description: Learn essential concepts of cybersecurity, including network security, encryption, and ethical hacking.
